name: Water We Doing
description:
GMTK 2020 Submission

Have you ever wanted to have your own koi pond AND kind of control the movement of your fish? Well now you can!
Flop right into the magical world of Water We Doing. Enjoy the relaxing ambience of 4 unique koi ponds as procedurally generated koi fish engage in Mortal Koibat to avoid dying on the banks.

Water you waiting for?

You can also play the game here!
http://makegamesplay.games/games/WaterWeDoing/

Credits
